description: This trap indicates that the RTP packet loss count has exceeded
a user-specified threshold in one or more RTP sessions on the
specified shelf and slot.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-RTCP-MIB::sonusRtcpPacketLossThresholdExceededNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: The shelf index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex

description: The slot index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that the RTP packet loss threshold
was not exceeded in any RTP session on the specified shelf
and slot for a period of 15 seconds.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-RTCP-MIB::sonusRtcpPacketLossThresholdClearedNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: The shelf index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex

description: The slot index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that no RTP packets and no RTCP packets were received
on a session originating on the specified shelf and slot.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-RTCP-MIB::sonusRtcpNoRtpOrRtcpPacketsReceivedNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: The shelf index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex

description: The slot index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that the condition of no RTP or RTCP packets received
has not occured on the specified shelf and slot for a period of 15 seconds.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-RTCP-MIB::sonusRtcpNoRtpOrRtcpPacketsClearedNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: The shelf index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex

variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex

variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
